alert.note: Alert for Dolores (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 05 at 1:10PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Colorado, including the following counties, Dolores and San Miguel. * WHEN...Until 415 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 108 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between .75 and 1.0 inches of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of North Central Dolores and Central San Miguel Counties
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
